The client is immunocomprised"Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised""Potential contraindications" = "Immunocompromised" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D5.DT.JEcontraindications * Tabs: JE

Create a clinical note"Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed""Immunization recommendation status" = "Further evaluation needed" Referenced in the following locations: * Decision Tables: IMMZ.D2.DT.Pneumococcal.2doseswithboosterdose * Tabs: Pneumococcal
The client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred in immunocompromised clients.The client is immunocompromised, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement. Inactivated Vero cell-derived vaccines are preferred over live attenuated or live recombinant vaccines.The client is currently pregnant, consider risks of vaccination and make a judgement.
